game.name: Gamer Stop Simulator
game.shortDescription: 게임 매장을 운영하세요! 게임과 콘솔을 사고, 수리하고, 희귀 아이템을 수집하세요. 협상하고 가게를 확장하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gamer Stop Simulator is a simulation game where you manage a video game store. Buy games and consoles from customers, repair broken devices, test games, and add rare items to your collection. Negotiate prices, expand your store, and grow your business in this exciting retail experience!
